meaning: A white complexion hides a hundred flaws
description: Fair skin makes one look beautiful despite other flaws.

examples.translation: Does fair skin really hide a hundred flaws?

examples.chinese: 一白遮百丑,牙白更靓丽
examples.translation: Fair skin hides flaws, white teeth make you even more beautiful.

examples.chinese: 俗话说一白遮百丑,皮肤黑不可怕
examples.translation: They say fair skin hides flaws, but dark skin isn't bad.
